content.rendered:
Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/no-water-flow-redstone.15122/

We use this plugin to prevent water from damaging redstone

General:
Basically stops water (and any other flowing block ie. Lava) from breaking any type of redstone!Really simple and useful for test severs and factions servers!

Commands & Permissions:
None

Config:​

Code (Text):
# IF you need a reference for the blocks use this scroll down a bit https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/bukkit/org/bukkit/Material.html
noBreak:
– REDSTONE_COMPARATOR
– REDSTONE_COMPARATOR_OFF
– REDSTONE_COMPARATOR_ON
– REDSTONE_TORCH_OFF
– REDSTONE_TORCH_ON
– REDSTONE_WIRE
– DIODE
– DIODE_BLOCK_OFF
– DIODE_BLOCK_ON
– REDSTONE
Problems and bugs:If you have any problems with this plugin, please use the discussion thread. I will fix them as soon as possible.

Questions or requests?:

If you have any questions or comments, please leave them below. If you would like to request a feature, please send me a PM.
